name: Barbed Devil
damage_resistances: cold, bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical weapons that aren't silvered

special_abilities.name: Barbed Hide.
descriptions: At the start of each of its turns, the barbed devil deals 5 (1d10) piercing damage to any creature grappling it.

special_abilities.name: Devil's Sight.
descriptions: Magical darkness doesn't impede the devil's darkvision.

special_abilities.name: Magic Resistance.
descriptions: The devil has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack.
descriptions: The devil makes three melee attacks: one with its tail and two with its claws. Alternatively, it can use Hurl Flame twice.

actions.name: Claw.
descriptions: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft ., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.

actions.name: Tail.
descriptions: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) piercing damage.

actions.name: Hurl Flame.
descriptions: Ranged Spell Attack: +5 to hit, range 150 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (3d6) fire damage. If the target is a flammable object that isn't being worn or carried, it also catches fire.
